description: Get fast answers about your workouts, recovery, sleep, and daily cycles from your WHOOP data. Explore trends and compare time ranges to surface insights like HRV, strain, and sleep performance. Keep your data private and under your control.

accessToken.description: Your WHOOP API access token from OAuth authorization

cacheTimeout.description: How long to cache API responses (seconds)

refreshToken.description: Your WHOOP API refresh token for automatic renewal

capabilities.name: get_whoop_auth_status
capabilities.description: Get WHOOP authentication status and connection info

capabilities.name: get_whoop_profile
capabilities.description: Get WHOOP user profile information including name and basic details

capabilities.name: get_whoop_workouts
capabilities.description: Get WHOOP workout data with optional date range and limit

capabilities.name: get_whoop_recovery
capabilities.description: Get WHOOP recovery data with optional date range and limit

capabilities.name: get_whoop_sleep
capabilities.description: Get WHOOP sleep data with optional date range and limit

capabilities.name: get_whoop_cycles
capabilities.description: Get WHOOP physiological cycle data (daily summaries) with optional date range and limit

capabilities.name: clear_whoop_cache
capabilities.description: Clear all cached WHOOP data to force fresh API calls
